ti:edition.ti:label: De Josepho
ti:edition.ti:description: Philo Judaeus. Cohn, Leonard, editor. Opera quae supersunt, Volume 4. Berlin: Reimer, 1902.

ti:translation.ti:label: De Josepho
ti:translation.ti:description: Philo of Alexandria, "A TREATISE OF THE LIFE OF A MAN OCCUPIED WITH AFFAIRS OF STATE, OR ON JOSEPH," translator: Charles Duke Yonge (George Bell and Sons, London, 1854)
